member.name: N:DotImaging
member.summary: The namespace is shared across several packages. Contains generic image class and extensions which include Bitmap interoperability extensions and algorithms which are mostly written in a form of an extension.

member.name: N:DotImaging.Primitives2D
member.summary: Contains portable 2D drawing primitives (Point, Size, Rectangle) compatible with System.Drawing structures and some additional ones.
